trans-unit.source: Provides a type converter to convert data for an image index to and from one data type to another for use by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> control.
For more information about type converters, see the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
> [!NOTE] > Typically, you do not directly create an instance of a TreeViewImageIndexConverter.
Instead, call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetConverter%2A> method of <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>.
For more information, see the examples in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> base class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewImageIndexConverter"></xref> class.
Access the TreeViewImageIndexConverter class through the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>.
Converts the specified value object to a 32-bit signed integer object.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> to provide locale information.
The <xref:System.Object> to convert.
An <xref:System.Object> that represents the converted value.
Converts the specified object to the specified destination type.

An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context, which can be used to extract additional information about the environment this type converter is being invoked from.
This parameter or properties of this parameter can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> that provides locale information.
The object to convert, typically an index represented as an <xref:System.Int32>.
The type to convert the object to, often a <xref:System.String>.
An <xref:System.Object> that represents the converted value.
Returns a collection of standard index values for the image list associated with the specified format context.

An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context, which can be used to extract additional information about the environment this type converter is being invoked from.
This parameter or properties of this parameter can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
A <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> that holds a standard set of valid index values.
If no image list is found, this collection will contain a single object with a value of -1.
Gets a value indicating <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> is valid in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> collection.
As implemented in this class, this property always returns `false`.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> is valid in the standard values collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
